title: Gunapala Ratnasekera says he resigned, but President refused to accept
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); State Minister Gunapala Ratnasekera told Parliament that he handed over his letter of resignation to the President.
Further, he said that President Gotabaya Rajapaksa refused to accept it.
Gunapala Ratnasekera says he resigned, but President refused to accept

Galle Face Protest : Additional Magistrate orders police to refer request to Chief Magistrate
